alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 2:18AM CDT until September 24 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 218 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Whitesboro to 10 miles southeast of Albion to 6 miles east of Nashoba to near Cloudy, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wright City, Rufe, Smithville, Hochatown, Slim, Bethel, Battiest, Pickens, Ringold, Mount Herman, and Sherwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
